text: 2 Broke Girls is an American television sitcom on CBS. It began on September 19, 2011 and ended on April 17, 2017. It is set in Williamsburg, Brooklyn, New York City. It is about two waitresses in their twenties who work together at a diner. Kat Dennings plays Max Black, who is from a poor, underclass background. Beth Behrs plays Caroline Wesbox Channing, who until recently was rich. Garrett Morris plays Earl, the cashier at the diner. He is an elderly African-American former jazz musician. Jonathan Kite plays Oleg, the diner's cook, a hypersexual Ukrainian who lacks social skills. Matthew Moy plays Han Lee, the diner's owner, a very short Korean. Jennifer Coolidge plays Sophie, Max and Caroline's histrionic Polish neighbor. The show was created by comedian Whitney Cummings. == Other websites == *Official website * Category:2011 American television series debuts Category:2017 American television series endings Category:2010s American sitcoms Category:2010s American workplace television series Category:2010s workplace comedy television series Category:American workplace comedy television series Category:Brooklyn in fiction Category:CBS network shows Category:Television series about friendship Category:Television series set in New York City Category:English-language television programs
title: 2 Broke Girls
